welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sturbridge, where the charm of a small New England town meets the rich history of the United States. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, visit our famous living history museum, and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport is used exclusively by the United States Air Force.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Central Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
